item.title: mathilda
item.description: × MATHILDA HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ MATHILDA MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Assassins Lane: ROAM Tier : S Tier BP : 32000 DM : 599 Ticket : 0 mathilda × @ Close More Info Hero skills Mathilda Skills 1 × Ancestral Guidance Mathilda gains (Ancestral Guidance) while moving. When it is fully charged, her next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 160( +100% Total Physical ATK) ( +100% Total Magic Power) (Magic Damage) to the target and increasing her Movement Speed by 80 that will decay rapidly in 2.
